actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish the North Country National Scenic Trail located in portions of New York, Pennsylvania, Ohio, Michigan, Wisconsin, Minnesota, and North Dakota, as a component of the National Trails System.
short_title: North Country National Scenic Trail Act

summary.text: North Country National Scenic Trail Act - Establishes the North Country Trail within Federal lands in New York, Pennsylvania, Ohio, Michigan, Wisconsin, Minnesota and North Dakota. Provides for the inclusion of State, local, and privately held lands. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to implement the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: North Country National Scenic Trail Act

A bill to establish the North Country National Scenic Trail located in portions of New York, Pennsylvania, Ohio, Michigan, Wisconsin, Minnesota, and North Dakota, as a component of the National Trails System.
